displayProperties.name: Rapid Impacts
displayProperties.description: Dealing damage with a Grenade Launcher temporarily increases the reload speed of Grenade Launchers.

displayProperties.name: Fell the Revenant
displayProperties.description:
Deal increased weapon damage to Scorn. 

Wearing Shadestalker Armor (currently {var:1903370001} of 4) increases the bonus damage.

displayProperties.name: Enhanced Ether Generator
displayProperties.description:
Dark Ether Reaper origin trait has a chance to spawn an extra Dark Ether charge.

Weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait are overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Killing Breeze
displayProperties.description:
Rapid weapon final blows grant you a bonus to mobility.

Weapon final blows with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait count as more than one.

displayProperties.name: One with Frost
displayProperties.description: While Frost Armor is active, [Stasis] Stasis weapons gain increased reload speed and stability. Stasis Swords gain increased guard resistance.

displayProperties.name: Bleak Domain
displayProperties.description: Bleak Watcher turrets are enhanced and grant icicle projectiles to weapons.

displayProperties.name: Sovereignty
displayProperties.description: Sovereignty

displayProperties.name: CQC Optics: High
displayProperties.description: Slightly increases zoom magnification.

displayProperties.name: Aerodynamics
displayProperties.description: Grants increased blast radius and projectile speed.

displayProperties.description: Adds a surprise gift appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Peppermint Burst
displayProperties.description: Adds a pepperminty appearance to your transmat effects.

displayProperties.name: Marksman Optics: Low
displayProperties.description: Slightly reduces zoom magnification.

displayProperties.name: Overload Submachine Gun
displayProperties.description: Landing consecutive hits with any Submachine Gun you are wielding disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Submachine Guns are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Unstoppable Pulse Rifle
displayProperties.description: Aiming down the sights of a Pulse Rifle for a short time loads a powerful explosive payload that stuns unshielded combatants. Strong against [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions. Additionally, Pulse Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Scout Rifle
displayProperties.description: Scout Rifles you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Scout Rifles are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Classified
displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Anti-Barrier Shotgun
displayProperties.description: Shotguns you are wielding fire shield-piercing rounds and stun [Shield-Piercing] Barrier Champions. Additionally, Shotguns are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.name: Overload Breechloaded Grenade Launcher
displayProperties.description: Damaging a combatant with Primary or Special ammo Grenade Launchers disrupts combatants, stunning them, delaying ability energy regeneration and lowering combatant damage output. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions. Additionally, Primary and Special ammo Grenade Launchers are always overcharged when that modifier is active.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: Served Cold
displayProperties.description:
Picking up a [Stasis] Stasis Shard grants you class ability energy. 

Picking up a [Void] Void Breach grants you melee energy.

displayProperties.name: Kinetic Impacts
displayProperties.description:
Sustained damage with a Power Grenade Launcher causes the combatant to emit a shockwave that damages nearby combatants.

This shockwave can stun [Stagger] Unstoppable Champions.

displayProperties.name: Supernova
displayProperties.description: Picking up a Void Breach causes your next source of Void damage to create a large weakening pulse.

displayProperties.name: Conductive Cosmic Crystal
displayProperties.description: Your [Arc] Arc abilities, [Void] Void abilities, and weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait do bonus damage to targets that are affected by a [Stasis] Stasis debuff.

displayProperties.name: Brain Freeze
displayProperties.description:
Frozen combatants become surrounded by chilling fog, which slows combatants that aren't already.

Weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait deal more damage to frozen combatants.

displayProperties.name: CQC Optics: Low
displayProperties.description: Slightly reduces zoom magnification.

displayProperties.name: Wind Chill
displayProperties.description:
Rapid [Stasis] Stasis weapon precision hits grant you a stack of Frost Armor.

Rapid precision hits from weapons with the Dark Ether Reaper origin trait grant you more stacks of Frost Armor.

displayProperties.name: Crystalline Converter
displayProperties.description: Gather [Stasis] Stasis Shards to gain stacks of Crystalline Converter. Your next powered [Stasis] Stasis melee hit creates Stasis crystals equal to the number of stacks you have.

displayProperties.name: Total Carnage
displayProperties.description:
After finishing a powerful combatant, gain temporary damage resistance.

While you have 2 or more Shadestalker armor pieces equipped (currently {var:1903370001} of 4), after finishing a powerful combatant, gain increased temporary damage resistance and replenish health.

displayProperties.name: Power from Pain
displayProperties.description: Rapid final blows against weakened combatants grants you Devour.

displayProperties.name: Trace Evidence
displayProperties.description: Rapid precision hits or rapid final blows on targets affected by Jolt or Blind will generate Ionic Traces.

displayProperties.description: Keep it secret.  Keep it safe.

displayProperties.name: No Backpack
displayProperties.description: Final blows create ammo.

displayProperties.name: Marksman Optics: High
displayProperties.description: Slightly increases zoom magnification.

displayProperties.name: Vestigial Alchemy
displayProperties.description:
This weapon gains energy when you pick up Vestiges and allows you to create ammo at the projectile impact point for you and your allies. Special ammo mode unlocks at 50% energy, while Heavy ammo mode unlocks at 100% energy. 

To transform Vestiges into Special ammo, [Alternate Weapon Action]  and cycle through all available firing modes. 

To transform Vestiges into Heavy ammo, [Alternate Weapon Action]  and cycle firing modes a second time.

displayProperties.name: Harvester Spike
displayProperties.description: Harvest the Vestiges of your foes.

displayProperties.name: Gridskipper
displayProperties.description: Gridskipper

displayProperties.name: Umbral Harbinger

displayProperties.name: Dark Ether Reaper
displayProperties.description:
Final blows with this weapon periodically spawn Dark Ether charges.

Charges can be detonated early with weapons fire or by coming into contact with them. Doing so refills this weapon from reserves.
